taskbody.context: The default configuration of delegate hosts sets the value of the SERVICED_ZK variable to the master host only. Use this procedure to update the setting to include all of the hosts in the ZooKeeper ensemble. Perform this procedure on each delegate host in your cluster.

step.cmd: Log in to the delegate host .

substep.cmd: Navigate to the end of the file, and cut the line that contains the SERVICED_ZK variable declaration at that location.
substep.info: The value of this declaration specifies three endpoints.

substep.cmd: Locate the SERVICED_ZK variable near the beginning of the file, and then delete the line it is on.
substep.info: The value of this declaration is just the master host.

substep.cmd: Paste the SERVICED_ZK variable declaration from the end of the file in the location of the just-deleted declaration.

step.stepresult: The following example shows the environment variable for a delegate host that is not a node in the ZooKeeper cluster: SERVICED_ZK=198.51.100.135:2181,198.51.100.136:2181,198.51.100.137:2181
